channel.title: Yellow Chartreuse on Need a drink?
channel.description: Recent content in Yellow Chartreuse on Need a drink?

item.title: Greenpoint
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rye whisky or bourbon
  • 30 ml yellow Chartreuse
  • 30 ml sweet vermouth
  • 2 dashes aromatic bitters
  • orange twist

Instructions

  1. Stir ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with a orange twist.
